TopicTitle: Station destroyed on reloading it from the tracking station

Articles.Content: I tried to build a station in LKO, all was going fine but after the first docking I returned to the KSC and reloaded the station, when it reloaded I witnessed what looked like the aftermath of one of the worst kraken attacks ever, the craft broke in multiple pieces and a lot of them where teleported in an escape trajectory of Kerbin.  Any idea on how to avoid such Kraken attacks until a fix is out?

Moved to KSP2 Technical Support.  

Also, welcome to the KSP forums @RaptorF9!
